entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
